page.title: 04Emma King Concert Day
page.content: On June 6 1985. It was a Thursday the second day of the concert.7.30am I was up and a wake and excited.At about 8.15am we set off to go to school. 9.00am we went into the hall to have hymn practice. 10.30am it was play time and I was wondering what was going to happen at the concert that night.12.00am I went to Swimming Club and practised some strokes.12.30am changed and had lunch.2.45pm We had rounders and we won.3.40pm School had finished and we went to collect Jason from school.6.45 got to school ready for the concert.7.00 The concert started and the orchestra played See the Conquering Hero come. Half way through the concert we had a break. The audience went to have a drink and a biscuit and so did the orchestra and choir. I enjoyed myself that day while we were playing.
